scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:unit
scripts.open-api:generate:linux:shared:dev: export PUBLIC_API_URL='http://127.0.0.1:8080/openapi.json' && node generate-openapitools-json.js && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key typescript-fetch
scripts.open-api:generate:linux:shared:publish: export PUBLIC_API_URL='https://todos-service-ek4b.onrender.com/openapi.json' && node generate-openapitools-json.js && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key typescript-fetch
scripts.open-api:generate:windows:shared:dev: set PUBLIC_API_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8080/openapi.json && node generate-openapitools-json.js && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key typescript-fetch
scripts.open-api:generate:windows:shared:publish: set PUBLIC_API_URL=https://todos-service-ek4b.onrender.com/openapi.json && node generate-openapitools-json.js && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key typescript-fetch
scripts.open-api:generate:linux:dev: rm -rf ./src/lib/generated-client && npm run open-api:generate:linux:shared:dev && npm run open-api:zod:linux:dev
scripts.open-api:generate:linux:publish: rm -rf ./src/lib/generated-client && npm run open-api:generate:linux:shared:publish && npm run open-api:zod:linux:publish
scripts.open-api:generate:windows:dev: (rmdir /s /q .\src\lib\generated-client || dir) && npm run open-api:generate:windows:shared:dev && npm run open-api:zod:windows:dev
scripts.open-api:generate:windows:publish: (rmdir /s /q .\src\lib\generated-client || dir) && npm run open-api:generate:windows:shared:publish && npm run open-api:zod:windows:publish
